Class PieceInfo

java.lang.Object
com.shiroyama.chess2.chessboard.pieces.PieceInfo
public class PieceInfo extends Object
Represents a chess piece with its properties and actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • PieceInfo

      public PieceInfo(Team team, PieceType pieceType, TargetPoint position)
      Constructor for the class.
      Parameters:
      team - the Team of the piece (BLACK or WHITE)
      pieceType - the PieceType of the piece (PAWN, BISHOP, etc.)
      position - the initial position of the piece on the board

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the piece, including its color and type.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the piece's name.

    • getName

      public String getName(boolean combatOver)
      Gets the name of the piece for display after the combat is over.
      Parameters:
      combatOver - indicates whether combat has ended
      Returns:
      a string representation of the piece's name for post-combat display

    • getDefaultHp

      public static int getDefaultHp(PieceType pieceType)
      Gets the default HP (hit points) for a given piece type.
      Parameters:
      pieceType - the type of the piece
      Returns:
      the default HP value for the specified piece type

    • shoot

      public void shoot(TargetPoint targetPosition, List<Projectile> projectiles)
      Creates and adds new Projectile to the list of active projectiles.
      Parameters:
      targetPosition - the target position for the projectile
      projectiles - the list of active projectiles which the new projectile will be added
